description.p: Returns an angle in radians for an angle expressed in degrees.
Returns the radians for an angle expressed in degrees.

discussion.p: The Radians function returns an angle in radians for an angle expressed in degrees. See also [Degrees].

example.caption: Radians() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Radians(180) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 3.14159265358979
